name: Claude Sonnet 4.5
description: Anthropic's most advanced Sonnet model, optimized for agents and coding workflows. Delivers state-of-the-art performance on SWE-bench Verified with improvements in system design and security.

zh-Hans.description: Anthropic 迄今为止最先进的 Sonnet 模型，针对真实世界的代理和编码工作流程进行了优化。在 SWE-bench Verified 等编码基准测试中表现出色，在系统设计、代码安全和规范遵循方面有所提升。
